name: Pitch Shifter
description: Performs pitch shifting using a time-domain algorithm. Can be paired with the Tracker algorithm.

parameters.name: Shift algorithm
parameters.description: Chooses the pitch shifting algorithm (3-phase usually sounds better but uses more CPU).

parameters.name: Grain delay
parameters.description: Maximum length of the delay line used by the pitch shifter. Mean latency is half this value.

parameters.name: Octaves
parameters.description: The pitch shift amount, in octaves.

parameters.name: Semitones
parameters.description: The pitch shift amount, in semitones.

parameters.name: Cents
parameters.description: The pitch shift amount, in cents.

parameters.name: Audio input
parameters.description: The bus to use as the audio input.

parameters.name: Shift input
parameters.description: The bus to use as a V/octave pitch shift amount CV (0=None).

input_ports.name: Audio Input
input_ports.description: Audio signal to be pitch shifted.

input_ports.name: Shift CV Input
input_ports.description: V/octave CV input to control pitch shift amount.
